description: A blend of virgin and refined olive oil The oil helps in preserving the freshness and crispness of fried food and snacks This oil is ideal for frying, oven baking and dressing purposesContains 100 percent pure olives Contains 100 percent pure olives Olive oil is the natural oil extracted from olives, the fruit of the olive tree.olive oil is loaded with antioxidants,some of which have powerful biological effects.
